data.title: Movies set in tuscany
data.meta_description: Movies set in tuscany: Under the Tuscan Sun (2003), Shadows in the Sun (2005), My House in Umbria (2003), Stealing Beauty (1996), Made in Italy (2020), Toscana (2022), Letters to Juliet (2010), The Ages of Love (2011), A Five Star Life (2013), My Friends: How It All Began (2011)
